Hello,
I'm working on a workflow extension and I would like to add a checkbox, I use workflow API v4 (<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/automation/custom-workflow-actions>) but I don't know how to define my input filed :
```[
                    "typeDefinition" => [
                        "name"      => "stop",
                        "type"      => "string",
                        "fieldType" => "booleancheckbox",
                    ],
                    "supportedValueTypes" => ["STATIC_VALUE"],
                    "isRequired" => false
],```
I tried with boolean type but I had a 400 and with this definition I have a select displayed instead of checkbox. Thanks

Hey <@U02E6LPLW72>, I believe the custom actions API doesnâ€™t support checkboxes at this time. The recommended workaround is to use a dropdown (`type=enumeration, fieldType=select`) with options for Yes (`true`) and No (`false`)
